locations.description: Device Update update account primary and failover location details

mqttBrokerEndpoints.description: MQTT Broker endpoints used for device communication.

deviceEnrollmentScope.description: Subscription or resource group used for device enrollment.

deviceEnrollmentManagedIdentityResourceI.description: User assigned managed identity used for device enrollment.

identity.description: The type of identity used for the resource.

keyVaultKeyUri.description: The URI of the key vault

userAssignedIdentity.description: The full resourceId of the user assigned identity to be used for key vault access. Identity has to be also assigned to the Account

Encryption.description: The CMK encryption settings on the Device Update account.

role.description: Whether the location is primary or failover

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of Update Accounts list.

UpdateAccountUpdate.description: Request payload used to update an existing Update Account.

identity.description: The type of identity used for the resource.

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

TagUpdate.description: Request payload used to update an existing resource's tags.

tags.description: List of key value pairs that describe the resource. This will overwrite the existing tags.

UpdateProtocol.description: The update protocol representing the version of the device update protocol the agent supports.

updateProtocol.description: The update protocol representing the version of the device update protocol the agent supports

compatibilityProperties.description: The compat properties of the agent. This object can be thought of as a set of key-value pairs where the key is the name of the compatibility property and the value is the value of the compatibility property. There will always be at least 1 compat property and no more than 5

sequenceNumber.description: The sequence number of the agent info used to distinguish whether the agent info needs to be updated from the agent

AgentInfo.description: The agent info for the agent that indicates what updates it is compatible with.

values.name: ApplyDeployment
values.description: Apply the deployment to the agent

DeploymentAction.description: The deployment action the agent take

retryTimestamp.description: Datetime when the call requested the deployment be retried.

updateId.description: The update that this step installs if it is of reference type.

resultDetails.description: A string containing further details about the install result

StepResult.description: The step result under an update.

resultDetails.description: A string containing further details about the install result

InstallResult.description: The install result of an update and any step results under it.

DeploymentDeviceStatesList.description: The list of deployment device states.

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items.

retryCount.description: The number of times this deployment has been retried on this device.

movedOnToNewDeployment.description: Boolean flag indicating whether this device is in a newer deployment and can no longer retry this deployment.

error.description: The error details of the Failed state.  This is not present if the deployment state is not Failed.

subgroupStatus.description: The collection of device class subgroup status objects

values.name: Active
values.description: The deployment can be sent to devices targeted in the deployment.

values.name: ActiveWithSubgroupFailures
values.description: The deployment can be sent to some devices targeted in the deployment but at least 1 subgroup is in a failed state.

values.name: Failed
values.description: The deployment will not be sent to any devices.  Consult error for more details about what failed.

values.name: Inactive
values.description: A newer deployment for this group has been created and no devices in the group will receive this deployment.

values.name: Canceled
values.description: The deployment has been canceled and no devices will receive it.

DeviceClassSubgroupDeploymentStatus.description: Device class subgroup deployment status metadata.

deploymentState.description: The state of the subgroup deployment.

error.description: The error details of the Failed state.  This is not present if the deployment state is not Failed.

totalDevices.description: The total number of devices in the deployment.

devicesInProgressCount.description: The number of devices that are currently in deployment.

devicesCompletedFailedCount.description: The number of devices that have completed deployment with a failure.

devicesCompletedSucceededCount.description: The number of devices which have successfully completed deployment.

devicesCanceledCount.description: The number of devices which have had their deployment canceled.

values.name: Active
values.description: The subgroup deployment can be sent to devices targeted in the deployment.

values.name: Failed
values.description: The subgroup deployment failed and will not be sent to any devices.

values.name: Inactive
values.description: A newer deployment for this subgroup has been created and no devices in the subgroup will receive this deployment.

values.name: Canceled
values.description: The subgroup deployment has been canceled and no devices will receive it.

updateId.description: The update Id for the deployment

state.description: The state the agent is in this deployment

DeploymentInfo.description: The agent metadata for a deployment.

error.description: The agent enrollment error detail. This is only populated when state is Failed

agentId.description: This is the external device Id of the Microsoft.Devices/Device resource referenced by this agent

deviceClassId.description: This is the ID of the device class of this agent

deviceResourceId.description: This is the resource Id of the Microsoft.Devices/Device resource referenced by this agent

activeMqttBrokerEndpoint.description: This is the active MQTT broker endpoint for this agent

agentInfo.description: This is the compatibility info for the agent that indicates what version of the device update protocol it supports and its compat properties.

latestDeploymentInfo.description: This is the metadata about the latest deployment the agent has attempted

installedUpdateId.description: The current installed update Id on this agent

deviceUuid.description: This is the device UUID for this agent

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of Agents list.

updateProtocol.description: The update protocol representing the version of the device update protocol the agent supports

compatibilityProperties.description: The compat properties of the device class. This object can be thought of as a set of key-value pairs where the key is the name of the compatibility property and the value is the value of the compatibility property. There will always be at least 1 compat property and no more than 5

DeviceClassInfo.description: The compatibility info for the device class that indicates what updates it is compatible with.

deviceClassId.description: This is the ID of the Device Class

deviceClassInfo.description: This is the compatibility info for the device class that will be used to check compatibility with updates.

highestVersionCompatibleUpdateId.description: UpdateId that is the highest version compatible with this device compatibility class.

installableUpdates.description: The list of installable update Ids.

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of Device Classes list.

ActiveDeployment.description: The details of an active deployment that is currently being offered to agents.

startDateTime.description: The start date for the active deployment

updateManifest.description: The update manifest that contains all of the metadata for the active deployment

updateManifestSignature.description: The update manifest signature that is used to validate the integrity of the update manifest

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of Active Deployments list.

deploymentId.description: The caller-provided deployment identifier. This cannot be longer than 73 characters, must be all lower-case, and cannot contain '&', '^', '[', ']', '{', '}', '|', '<', '>', forward slash, backslash, or double quote.

updateId.description: UpdateId that is deployed as part of this deployment.

deviceClasses.description: The device classes the deployment is compatible with. This is not provided by the caller during creating the deployment but is automatically determined by Device Update

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of the Deployments list.

importManifest.description: Import manifest metadata like source URL, file size/hashes, etc.

files.description: One or more update file properties like filename and source URL.

url.description: Azure Blob location from which the import manifest can be downloaded by Device Update for IoT Hub. This is typically a read-only SAS-protected blob URL with an expiration set to at least 4 hours.

sizeInBytes.description: File size in number of bytes.

hashes.description: A JSON object containing the hash(es) of the file. At least SHA256 hash is required. This object can be thought of as a set of key-value pairs where the key is the hash algorithm, and the value is the hash of the file calculated using that algorithm.

ImportManifestMetadata.description: Metadata describing the import manifest, a document which describes the files and other metadata about an update version.

filename.description: Update file name as specified inside import manifest.

url.description: Azure Blob location from which the update file can be downloaded by Device Update for IoT Hub. This is typically a read-only SAS-protected blob URL with an expiration set to at least 4 hours.

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of Update list.

friendlyName.description: Friendly update name specified by importer.

isDeployable.description: Whether the update can be deployed to a device on its own.

referencedBy.description: List of update identities that reference this update.

scanResult.description: Update aggregate scan result (calculated from payload file scan results).

manifestVersion.description: Schema version of manifest used to import the update.

importedDateTime.description: Date and time in UTC when the update was imported.

createdDateTime.description: Date and time in UTC when the update was created.

Compatibility.description: Key-value pairs representing update compatibility information.

values.name: Inline
values.description: Step type that performs code execution.

values.name: Reference
values.description: Step type that installs another update.

handler.description: Identity of handler that will execute this step. Required if step type is inline.

handlerProperties.description: Parameters to be passed to handler during execution.

files.description: Collection of file names to be passed to handler during execution. Required if step type is inline.

updateId.description: Referenced child update identity.  Required if step type is reference.

sizeInBytes.description: File size in number of bytes.

hashes.description: Mapping of hashing algorithm to base64 encoded hash values.

properties.description: Optional file properties (not consumed by service but pass-through to device).

relatedFiles.description: Optional related files metadata used together DownloadHandler metadata to download payload file.

downloadHandler.description: Optional download handler for utilizing related files to download payload file.

UpdateFileDownloadHandler.description: Download handler for utilizing related files to download payload file.

onHighestVersionUpdateDeviceCount.description: Number of devices on the highest version update.

newUpdatesAvailableDeviceCount.description: Number of devices with a newer update available.

updatesInProgressDeviceCount.description: Number of devices with update in-progress.

deviceCount.description: Total number of devices in the device class that need the update.

DeviceClassUpdatableDevices.description: Device compatibility class Id, update Id, and the number of devices that need the update.

DeviceClassUpdatableDevicesList.description: The list of updatable devices for a device class.

deviceClassHighestVersionUpdates.description: The list of device classes and the highest version update details for each.

FilterParameter.name: $filter
FilterParameter.description: May be used to filter the items in the result.

UpdateResourceNameParameter.name: updateResourceName
UpdateResourceNameParameter.description: Concatenated update provider, name and version separated by underscore.
